definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]
Monument to the People's Heroes, at Tiananmen Square
pinyin: Ren2 min2 Ying1 xiong2 Ji4 nian4 bei1

sentences.english: Her initials were enchased on the monument.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字縮寫字母刻在紀念碑上。

sentences.english: Traffic encircles the Angel of Independence monument on Mexico City’s Paseo de la Reforma.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥城改革大道，車輛環繞獨立天使紀念碑行駛。

sentences.english: A permanent memorial is being planned for the CTV building site.
sentences.chinese: 政府計劃在CTV大樓舊址建立永久的紀念碑。

sentences.english: Eg. The Korean people set up a monument in memory of Comrade Luo Shengjiao.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮人民立了一個紀念碑紀念羅盛教同志。

sentences.english: A wreath was laid on the monument to a fanfare of trumpets.
sentences.chinese: 在響亮的號角聲中花圈被獻在紀念碑前。

sentences.english: A monument was built in dedication to the memory of revolutionary martyrs.
sentences.chinese: 爲紀念革命烈士建造了一座紀念碑。

sentences.english: At the center of the square stands the monument.
sentences.chinese: 廣場中央聳立着紀念碑。

sentences.english: So far, the Soviet martyrs' monuments in China have been renovated.
sentences.chinese: 目前，中國境內的蘇軍烈士紀念碑修緝一新。

sentences.english: The monument bears the mark of age.
sentences.chinese: 紀念碑上有年深日久的痕跡。

sentences.english: Outside wall of the Zhenghe Memorial Tablet Collection, Zhenghe Park, Kunyang.
sentences.chinese: 昆陽鄭和公園鄭和紀念碑林牆外。

sentences.english: The monument is dedicated to the memory of the people's heroes.
sentences.chinese: 這座紀念碑是爲紀念人民英雄而建造的。

sentences.english: People raise monuments to soldiers who have died for their country.
sentences.chinese: 人們給爲國犧牲的軍人建立紀念碑。

sentences.english: Memorial to the victims of genocide.
sentences.chinese: 種族大屠殺遇難者紀念碑。

sentences.english: We were out all day visiting museums, monuments and churches.
sentences.chinese: 我們所有一天參觀博物館，紀念碑和教堂。

sentences.english: The letter on the monument was seriously worn and illegible.
sentences.chinese: 紀念碑上的字母嚴重磨損，難以辨認。

sentences.english: A virtual monument specially erected in memory of your loved ones?
sentences.chinese: 一個專門爲紀念你所愛的人豎立的虛擬的紀念碑？

definition: portrait/to do a portrait of sb
